DOC.brief_summary: Primary objective study prospectively compare evaluate efficacy well note side effect interscalene block combine suprascapular axillary nerve block ambulatory arthroscopic rotator cuff repair .
DOC.brief_title: Interscalene Combined Supra Scapular Axillary Nerve Blocks Rotator Cuff Repair
DOC.detailed_description: Patients elective arthroscopic rotator cuff repair randomize one two group . Group 1 : This group receive Interscalene block ( ultrasound guide nerve stimulator aid ) follow general anesthesia . Group 2 : This group receive Suprascapular Axillary nerve block ( ultrasound guide nerve stimulator aid ) follow general anesthesia . Performance time , quality efficacy well side-effects block evaluate term pain score recovery room , 4- 6 hour next morning , opioid usage patient satisfaction . Primary hypothesis : • Combined Suprascapular axillary nerve block provide similar postoperative analgesia compare interscalene block arthroscopic rotator cuff repair . Secondary hypothesis • Interscalene block associate side effect complication compare suprascapular nerve block axillary nerve block .
DOC.criteria: Elective shoulder arthroscopic rotator cuff repair ASA I III ( American Society Anaesthesia Classification ) ASA IV high ( American Society Anaesthesia Classification ) Obesity : BMI > 35 Narcotic Abuse/ Drug dependency Major Neurologic deficits Allergy local anesthetic Infection site puncture Mental impairment
